Title: WPF Control Toolkit
Description: WPF Control Toolkit is an extensible and powerful presentation framework based on WPF (aka avalon) platform. The framework implements many visual controls fully integrated in Visual Studio.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to WPF Control Toolkit project.
